Event Comment

ID
{{ eventComment.id }}
Comment
{{ eventComment.comment }}
Date
{{ eventComment.date | formatMediumDatetime }}
Event
{{ eventComment.event?.id }}
User
{{ eventComment.user?.id }}
Event Comment
{{ eventComment.eventComment?.id }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { IEventComment } from '../event-comment.model'; @Component({ selector: 'jhi-event-comment-detail', templateUrl: './event-comment-detail.component.html', }) export class EventCommentDetailComponent implements OnInit { eventComment: IEventComment | null = null; constructor(protected activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.activatedRoute.data.subscribe(({ eventComment }) => { this.eventComment = eventComment; }); } previousState(): void { window.history.back(); } }
